mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.qyid qyid, t.bzzwgs bzzwgs, t.sngdzw sngdzw, t.swgdzw swgdzw, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM CFPA_QY_ZWYX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , k.cplx cplx FROM CFPA_QY_ZWYX t
Left Join CFPA_QY_CPJS k on t.qyid = k.qyid And k.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_ZWYX(uuid,qyid,bzzwgs,sngdzw,swgdzw,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bzzwgs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sngdzw,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{swgdzw,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE CFPA_QY_ZWYX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.UUID = #{value}

INSERT INTO CFPA_QY_ZWYX(uuid,qyid,bzzwgs,sngdzw,swgdzw,delete_flag,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.qyid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qyid,#{item.bzzwgs,jdbcType=DOUBLE} bzzwgs,#{item.sngdzw,jdbcType=DOUBLE} sngdzw,#{item.swgdzw,jdbcType=DOUBLE} swgdzw,'N' delete_flag,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), qyid = VALUES(qyid), bzzwgs = VALUES(bzzwgs), sngdzw = VALUES(sngdzw), swgdzw = VALUES(swgdzw), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM CFPA_QY_ZWYX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
